verses.verse: וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> told אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> And Ahab לְאִיזֶ֔בֶל <WH348> Jezebel אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and how עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> all that Elijah וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and how הָרַ֛ג <WH2026> and withal how he had slain אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> all the prophets בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword

וַתִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אִיזֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH348> Then Jezebel מַלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> a messenger אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <WH452> unto Elijah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> So יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <WH6213> do אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> So let the gods וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> and even יוֹסִפ֔וּן <WH3254> [to me] and more כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if כָעֵ֤ת <WH6256> about this time מָחָר֙ <WH4279> of them by to morrow אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> also if I make אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֔ <WH5315> not thy life כְּנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> as the life אַחַ֥ד <WH259> of one מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> And when he saw וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> [that] he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and ran אֶל־ <WH413> about נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> for his life וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> and came בְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> to Beersheba אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [belongeth] to Judah וַיַּנַּ֥ח <WH3240> and left אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַעֲר֖וֹ <WH5288> his servant שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> himself הָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> But he himself went בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> journey י֔וֹם <WH3117> a day's וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> and came וַיֵּ֕שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat down תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under רֹ֣תֶם <WH7574> juniper tree [אֶחָת כ] (אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> a ק) וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> and he requested אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> for himself לָמ֔וּת <WH4191> that he might die וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and said רַ֗ב <WH7227> It is enough עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> now יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> now O LORD קַ֣ח <WH3947> take away נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> my life כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> I am not ט֥וֹב <WH2896> for I [am] not better אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> my מֵאֲבֹתָֽי׃ <WH1> than my fathers

וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> And as he lay וַיִּישַׁ֔ן <WH3462> and slept תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under רֹ֣תֶם <WH7574> juniper tree אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> under a וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> and behold זֶ֤ה <WH2088> there מַלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> behold then an angel נֹגֵ֣עַ <WH5060> touched בּ֔וֹ וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> him and said ל֖וֹ ק֥וּם <WH6965> unto him Arise אֱכֽוֹל׃ <WH398> [and] eat

וַיַּבֵּ֕ט <WH5027> And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <WH4763> at his head עֻגַ֥ת <WH5692> and behold [there was] a cake רְצָפִ֖ים <WH7529> baken on the coals וְצַפַּ֣חַת <WH6835> and a cruse מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> And he did eat וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> again וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> and laid him down

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> came again מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD שֵׁנִית֙ <WH8145> the second time וַיִּגַּע־ <WH5060> and touched בּ֔וֹ וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> him and said ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise אֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> [and] eat כִּ֛י <WH3588> because רַ֥ב <WH7227> [is] too great מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> is too הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> because the journey

וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> And he arose וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> and did eat וַיִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> and drink וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> and went בְּכֹ֣חַ ׀ <WH3581> in the strength הָאֲכִילָ֣ה <WH396> of that meat הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> and forty לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> nights עַ֛ד <WH5704> against הַ֥ר <WH2022> the mount הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God חֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> unto Horeb

וַיָּבֹא־ <WH935> And he came שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> thither unto a cave וַיָּ֣לֶן <WH3885> and lodged שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold דְבַר־ <WH1697> there and behold the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> [came] to him and he said ל֔וֹ מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֥ פֹ֖ה <WH6311> here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> And he said קַנֹּ֨א <WH7065> I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <WH7065> jealous לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָזְב֤וּ <WH5800> have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH4196> thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <WH2040> thrown down וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <WH5030> thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <WH2026> and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וָֽאִוָּתֵ֤ר <WH3498> and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <WH589> and I לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> and they seek אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> to take it away

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said צֵ֣א <WH3318> Go forth וְעָמַדְתָּ֣ <WH5975> and stand בָהָר֮ <WH2022> upon the mount לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And behold the LORD עֹבֵ֗ר <WH5674> passed by וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> wind גְּדוֹלָ֡ה <WH1419> and a great וְחָזָ֞ק <WH2389> and strong מְפָרֵק֩ <WH6561> rent הָרִ֨ים <WH2022> the mountains וּמְשַׁבֵּ֤ר <WH7665> and brake in pieces סְלָעִים֙ <WH5553> the rocks לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not בָר֖וּחַ <WH7307> [was] not in the wind יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֤ר <WH310> and after הָר֨וּחַ <WH7307> the wind רַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> an earthquake לֹ֥א <WH3808> not בָרַ֖עַשׁ <WH7494> [was] not in the earthquake יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [but] the LORD

וְאַחַ֤ר <WH310> And after הָרַ֙עַשׁ֙ <WH7494> the earthquake אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> a fire לֹ֥א <WH3808> not בָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> [was] not in the fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> and after הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire ק֖וֹל <WH6963> voice דְּמָמָ֥ה <WH1827> a still דַקָּֽה׃ <WH1851> small

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <WH452> And it was [so] when Elijah וַיָּ֤לֶט <WH3874> [it] that he wrapped פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> his face בְּאַדַּרְתּ֔וֹ <WH155> in his mantle וַיֵּצֵ֕א <WH3318> and went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> in the entering in הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <WH4631> of the cave וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about ק֔וֹל <WH6963> And behold [there came] a voice וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֥ פֹ֖ה <WH6311> here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> And he said קַנֹּ֨א <WH7065> I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <WH7065> jealous לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָזְב֤וּ <WH5800> have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH4196> thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <WH2040> thrown down וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <WH5030> thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <WH2026> and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וָאִוָּתֵ֤ר <WH3498> and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <WH589> and I לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> and they seek אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> to take it away ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> Go שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> return לְדַרְכְּךָ֖ <WH1870> on thy way מִדְבַּ֣רָה <WH4057> to the wilderness דַמָּ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וּבָ֗אתָ <WH935> and when thou comest וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֧ <WH4886> anoint אֶת־ <WH853> חֲזָאֵ֛ל <WH2371> Hazael לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [to be] king עַל־ <WH5921> over אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> over Syria

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> And Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <WH5250> of Nimshi תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> shalt thou anoint לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [to be] king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> and Elisha בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָט֙ <WH8202> of Shaphat מֵאָבֵ֣ל מְחוֹלָ֔ה <WH65> of Abelmeholah תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> shalt thou anoint לְנָבִ֖יא <WH5030> [to be] prophet תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH8478> your place

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come הַנִּמְלָ֛ט <WH4422> And it shall come to pass [that] him that escapeth מֵחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> the sword חֲזָאֵ֖ל <WH2371> of Hazael יָמִ֣ית <WH4191> slay יֵה֑וּא <WH3058> shall Jehu וְהַנִּמְלָ֛ט <WH4422> and him that escapeth מֵחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> from the sword יֵה֖וּא <WH3058> of Jehu יָמִ֥ית <WH4191> slay אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> shall Elisha

וְהִשְׁאַרְתִּ֥י <WH7604> Yet I have left בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> [me] seven אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> thousand כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבִּרְכַּ֗יִם <WH1290> all the knees אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not כָֽרְעוּ֙ <WH3766> which have not bowed לַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> unto Baal וְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> and every הַפֶּ֔ה <WH6310> and every mouth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not נָשַׁ֖ק <WH5401> which hath not kissed לֽוֹ׃

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> departed מִ֠שָּׁם <WH8033> there וַיִּמְצָ֞א <WH4672> thence and found אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> Elisha בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָט֙ <WH8202> of Shaphat וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he חֹרֵ֔שׁ <WH2790> who [was] plowing שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֤ר <WH6240> ten צְמָדִים֙ <WH6776> yoke לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> [of oxen] before וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he בִּשְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both הֶעָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> ten וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> passed אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH452> and Elijah אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <WH7993> by him and cast אַדַּרְתּ֖וֹ <WH155> his mantle אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> And he left אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּקָ֗ר <WH1241> the oxen וַיָּ֙רָץ֙ <WH7323> and ran אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אֵֽלִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> Elijah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶשְּׁקָה־ <WH5401> Let me I pray thee kiss נָּא֙ <WH4994> Please לְאָבִ֣י <WH1> my father וּלְאִמִּ֔י <WH517> and my mother וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> Go אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> after וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> thee And he said לוֹ֙ לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go שׁ֔וּב <WH7725> again כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מֶה־ <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> for what have I done לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <WH7725> And he returned back מֵאַחֲרָ֜יו <WH310> from him וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> צֶ֧מֶד <WH6776> a yoke הַבָּקָ֣ר <WH1241> of oxen וַיִּזְבָּחֵ֗הוּ <WH2076> and slew וּבִכְלִ֤י <WH3627> with the instruments הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> of the oxen בִּשְּׁלָ֣ם <WH1310> them and boiled הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> their flesh וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> unto the people וַיֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> and they did eat וַיָּ֗קָם <WH6965> Then he arose וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <WH1980> from אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <WH452> Elijah וַיְשָׁרְתֵֽהוּ׃ <WH8334> and ministered פ
